question: Battle of Salher was fought between Shivaji and Mughals in which of the following year?
explanation: The battle of Salher was fought between Shivaji Raje Bhonsle and the Mughals. Shivaji defeated Mughals in the Battle of Salher in 1672 CE and crowned himself at Raigarh and assumed the title Maharaja Chattrapati.
